{"id":1454938281,"question_id":3250,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1731816975,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1011 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1454938281/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Square Area by Removing Fences From a Field","memory":"267.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maximizeSquareArea(int m, int n, vector<int>& hFences, vector<int>& vFences) {\n        int mod = 1e9+7;\n        unordered_set<long long> hSet; \n        hFences.push_back(1);\n        hFences.push_back(m);\n        vFences.push_back(1);\n        vFences.push_back(n);\n        sort(hFences.begin(), hFences.end());\n        sort(vFences.begin(), vFences.end());\n        for(int i=0; i<hFences.size(); i++) {\n            for(int j=i+1; j<hFences.size(); j++) \n                hSet.insert( hFences[j]-hFences[i] );\n        };\n\n        long long ans = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<vFences.size(); i++) {\n            for(int j=i+1; j<vFences.size(); j++) {\n                if(hSet.find( vFences[j]-vFences[i] ) != hSet.end()) \n                    ans = max(ans, (long long)( vFences[j]-vFences[i] ) );\n            };\n        };       \n\n        if( ans == 0 )\n            return -1;\n        return ( ans * ans ) % mod;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-square-area-by-removing-fences-from-a-field","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
